gmd:metadataStandardName.gco:CharacterString: ISO 19139 Geographic Information - Metadata - Implementation Specification

gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: (creation): Bureau of Transportation Statistics, Federal Railroad Administration

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: RAILROAD_NTAD_100K_SW is a 1:100,000 scale line shapefile which is a subset of the rail network. Bureau of Transportation Statistics metadata states - 'The Rail Network is a comprehensive database of the nation's railway system at the 1:100,000 scale.' Data includes old railways that have been abandoned.

gmd:purpose.gco:CharacterString: BROAD, GENERAL information for planning, development, and research in Indiana National Transportation Atlas Database metadata states- "The data set provides location and attribute information for use in national and regional cartographic and network analysis applications."

gmd:credit.gco:CharacterString: Indiana Statewide GIS database was produced under an Indiana Department of Transportation contract. Data is from the National Transportation Atlas Database (NTAD) produced by the Bureau of Transportation Statistics. Bureau of Transportation Statistics requests - "Acknowledgment of the Bureau of Transportation Statistics National Transportation Atlas Database should be cited in products derived from these data."

gmd:useLimitation.gco:CharacterString: DATA DISCLAIMER This data set was compiled by Bernardin, Lochmueller and Associates, using data believed to be accurate; however, a degree of error is inherent in all data. This product is distributed "AS-IS" without warranties of any kind, either expressed or implied, including but not limited to warranties of suitability of a particular purpose or use. No attempt has been made in either the designed format or production of these data to define the limits or jurisdiction of any federal, state, or local government. These data are intended for use only at the published scale or smaller and are for reference purposes only. They are not to be construed as a legal document or survey instrument. A detailed on-the-ground survey and historical analysis of a single site may differ from this data. CREDIT Acknowledgment of the Federal Railroad Administration, Bureau of Transportation Statistics, National Transportation Atlas Database would be appreciated in products derived from these data.

No claims to accuracy are made on this data. It is intended to be used only for general planning purposes. Detailed planning or analysis will require more accurate data. LIMITATION OF LIABILITY The product is provided "AS IS", without any other warranties or conditions, expressed or implied, including, but not limited to, warranties for product quality, or suitability to a particular purpose or use. The risk or liability resulting from the use of this product is assumed by the user. Bernardin, Lochmueller and Associates shares no liability with product users indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages whatsoever, including, but not limited to, loss of revenue or profit, lost or damaged data or other commercial or economic loss. Bernardin, Lochmueller and Associates is not responsible for claims by a third party. The maximum aggregate liability to the original purchaser shall not exceed the amount paid by you for the product.

gmd:evaluationMethodDescription.gco:CharacterString: Bureau of Transportation Statistics metadata reports- "The network is not topologically connected. There should be no redundancy of lines or nodes in the data set. The data set is geographically accurate at the 1:100,000 scale."

gmd:measureDescription.gco:CharacterString: Bureau of Transportation Statistics metadata reports- "The network is not topologically connected. There should be no redundancy of lines or nodes in the data set. The data set is geographically accurate at the 1:100,000 scale."

Bureau of Transportation Statistics metadata reports- "The railroad ownership field is complete to approximately mid-2000. The FRA reports the following fields as complete - Railroad Ownership, State/County (FIPS5), State Code, FRA Regions, Link Type (subject to change), Passenger Flag, Abandoned Flag, Billing Railroads, Railroad Class, The FRA reports the following fields as incomplete - Signals, Density Code, Military Flag - applied only in some states, Abandonment Year"

Bureau of Transportation Statistics metadata reports- "The FRA reports that as many nodes as possible have been identified with a name. There are likely more that are not easily identified. Many nodes in the 1:100,000 scale rail network are 'mapped' to a node in the 1:2,000,000 scale rail network. Special note concerning trackage rights- In some cases, a 'short line'railroad may operate on its larger railroad connection(s) as its billing railroad. For example, the larger railroad(s) treat traffic originating or terminating on the short line as if it were originating or terminating its own line; perform the billing, car reporting, and car tracking; then share the revenue with the short line. These trackage rights may exist as four, five, or six in the sequence, while one and two remain empty."
Bureau of Transportation Statistics metadata reports- "The horizontal accuracy for these data can be stated as being that associated with data compiled at the 1:100,000 scale."
Vertical accuracy was not a factor in the digital production of the data set. No quantitative tests were performed.

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: Bureau of Transportation Statistics metadata reports - "After completing topological and attribute Verification in ArcInfo the data was converted to shapefile"

gmd:deliveryPoint.gco:CharacterString: Office of Policy, RRP-20, Mail Stop 15

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: Bernardin, Lochmueller and Associates downloaded the Railroads 100K shapefile from the National Transportation Atlas Database website (HTTP://www.bts.gov/gis/ntatlas/natlas.html) and selected out only those lines in the state of Indiana. File was transformed from geographic, to UTM Zone 16, NAD83, meters. Fields - Revision, Moddate, Tr8, Tr9, Density, Signals, and Abdyr, were deleted because no information existed in this subset.

This metadata was pre-parsed and parsed using CNS (Chew and Spit. v 2.6.1) and MP (Metadata Parser, v 2.7.1) software written by Peter N. Schweitzer (United States Geological Survey). The errors generated by MP were all addressed and corrected, except that no values were assigned to "Abscissa_Resolution" and "Ordinate_Resolution."
The following field were deleted from the dbf table using ESRI ArcView 3.2 because the fields provided little or no information: 'State', and FIPS. The file was saved as a UTM 16, NAD83 projection.
Shapefiles downloaded from the NTAD Website, HTTP://www.bts.gov/gis/ntatlas/natlas.html

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: TIGER/Line files, US Bureau of the Census

gmd:useLimitation.gco:CharacterString: This metadata file is intended to accompany the data set identified and received from the BLA/IGS. It should not to be altered or summarized. BLA/IGS does not support secondary distribution. If this data set was received from anyone besides the BLA/IGS, this metadata file and the data set it describes may lack integrity.

gmd:maintenanceNote.gco:CharacterString: Metadata was created as or translated to ISO 19139 for inclusion in the Big Ten Academic Alliance Geoportal.

gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: Big Ten Academic Alliance Geospatial Data Project

gmd:name.gco:CharacterString: Big Ten Academic Alliance Geospatial Data Project
